creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
description: arched rock formation at L; man in white robe sitting at front of covered fishing boat paddles through opening under rock formation; pale mountains in the distance
markings: R edge, round relief; R edge, square intaglio; bright yellow sticker L roller end: [E6]; white sticker L roller end: [SJ/47]
title: Landscape with Fisherman Outside a Cave
